import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Login = (props) => { const { email, setEmail, password, setPassword, handleLogin, handleSignup, hasAccount, setHasAccount, emailError, passwordError } = props return (
setEmail(e.target.value)} />

{emailError}

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

{passwordError}

{hasAccount ? ( <>

Don't have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}> Sign up

) : ( <>

Have an account ? setHasAccount(!hasAccount)}> Sign in

)}
); } export default Login;
